Generate_script_prompt:
Prompt: Give a quick tech news update script in the style of CNBC techcheck briefing as an example.
        Response: I'm Wall-E, and this is your CNBC techcheck Briefing for Monday April 29th. Tesla is asking shareholders to reinstate CEO Elon Musk's $56 billion pay package, which a Delaware judge voided earlier this year. The judge ruled that the record-setting compensation deal was, quote, deeply flawed. Tesla also saying it would ask shareholders to approve moving the company's incorporation from Delaware to Texas. The company has hired a proxy solicitor and plans to spend millions of dollars to help secure votes for the two proposals. Apple CEO Tim Cook says the company plans to look at manufacturing in Indonesia following a meeting with the country's president, Cook telling reporters following the meeting that he spoke with the president about his desire to see manufacturing there and that he believes in the country. The comments come as Apple is pushed to diversify its supply chain with more manufacturing outside of China in countries such as Vietnam and India. Shares of ASML falling today as the company missed its sales forecast but stuck to its full-year outlook. Net sales fell over 21 percent year-over-year, while net income dropped over 37 percent. ASML is highly important to the semiconductor industry as it builds machines that are required for manufacturing chips globally. Last year, weaker demand for consumer electronics hit chipmakers that produce for those devices, which has in turn impacted ASML. That's all for today. We'll see you back here tomorrow.
        Prompt: Give a quick tech news update script in the style of CNBC techcheck briefing using the following news titles and content. Use the same beginning and ending(including mentioning host Wall-E and Monday March 31), and replace CNBC techcheck briefing to 'AI briefing' 
 ""

Response:
Script:
i'm wall-e, and this is your ai briefing for monday, march 31st. today's top story: microsoft has announced a major ai partnership with openai, aiming to integrate advanced ai capabilities into its azure cloud platform. this move comes as competition in the cloud computing space heats up, with tech giants scrambling to incorporate ai to enhance their services. microsoft hopes the collaboration will give them a competitive edge in the evolving tech landscape.

in other news, google is making strides in quantum computing, revealing plans to achieve quantum supremacy by 2024. the tech giant is investing heavily in its quantum research division, with ceo sundar pichai calling it a critical area for future growth. analysts believe this could potentially revolutionize fields from cryptography to materials science.

meanwhile, shares of the electric vehicle maker rivian are surging after the announcement of a new strategic partnership with legacy automaker ford. the two companies are collaborating on a new line of electric trucks, combining rivian's innovative technology with ford's manufacturing expertise. investors are optimistic about the potential market expansion this deal offers.

finally, a look at the social media landscape. twitter is rolling out a new subscription service called "twitter blue," which offers users features like an undo button and bookmark folders. the service aims to attract power users and diversify twitter's revenue streams amid slowing ad sales.

that's all for today. we'll see you back here tomorrow
Polished Script:
i'm wall-e, welcoming you to today's tech briefing for monday, march 31st. starting with our top story, microsoft has unveiled a major ai partnership with openai, aiming to embed cutting-edge ai capabilities into its azure cloud platform. the collaboration seeks to give microsoft an edge in the fiercely competitive cloud computing market, where tech giants are racing to integrate ai into their services.

over to google, which is making significant progress in quantum computing. the company has announced its ambition to achieve quantum supremacy by 2024, heavily investing in its quantum research division. google's ceo sundar pichai has emphasized the importance of this area for future growth, with experts predicting revolutionary impacts on fields such as cryptography and materials science.

meanwhile, rivian is experiencing a surge in its stock prices following news of a new strategic alliance with ford. the partnership involves the development of a new line of electric trucks, merging rivian's innovative technology with ford's manufacturing prowess. investors are optimistic about the potential market opportunities this collaboration presents.

lastly, in the social media sphere, twitter is launching "twitter blue," a new subscription service offering features like an undo button and bookmark folders. this service is designed to attract power users and diversify twitter's revenue streams amidst declining ad sales.

that's all for today. we'll see you back here tomorrow
Podcast Title: EP-246 Microsoft's Ai Cloud Leap 🤖, Google's Quantum Quest 🧬, Rivian & Ford's Electric Alliance 🚙
Podcast Description:
join wall-e for today’s tech briefing on monday, march 31st, as we delve into the latest tech developments:

  • microsoft & openai ai partnership: microsoft aims to enhance its azure cloud platform with openai's cutting-edge ai, strengthening its position in the competitive cloud market.
  • google's quantum computing strides: aiming for quantum supremacy by 2024, google invests heavily in quantum research, potentially revolutionizing cryptography and materials science.
  • rivian & ford strategic alliance: rivian teams up with ford to create a new line of electric trucks, combining rivian's tech with ford's manufacturing, driving investor optimism.
  • twitter blue subscription service: twitter launches a new service offering features like an undo button to attract power users and boost revenue amidst declining ad sales.

tune in tomorrow for more tech updates!
Image Prompt: a cohesive podcast cover image set within a futuristic cityscape at dusk, blending technology and innovation themes. in the foreground, a sleek and futuristic model of a rivian electric vehicle with ford design elements is dynamically posed on an illuminated road, symbolizing their electric alliance. above the vehicle, a soft, ethereal glow of a cloud representing microsoft's ai cloud leap envelops the skyline, its tendrils interlacing with digital data streams in the air. to the left, a dazzling, abstract representation of a quantum circuit hovers against the twilight sky, depicting google’s quantum quest, with softly pulsating lights that merge into the surrounding elements. the composition is harmonious and visionary, emphasizing the interconnected advancements in ai, quantum computing, and electric innovation
